subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The novel “Tracks: Racing the Sun,” by Sandro Martini, follows Grand Prix racing between the world wars and the story of one of the sport’s great rivalries, between Tazio Nuvolari and Achille Varzi.
snippet: The novel “Tracks: Racing the Sun,” by Sandro Martini, follows Grand Prix racing between the world wars and the story of one of the sport’s great rivalries, between Tazio Nuvolari and Achille Varzi.
